caption.center: JACOB HEIMAN, Appellant, v. HENRY BISHOP and Others, Respondents, Impleaded

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Order confirming report of referee and denying plaintiff's motion for leave to enter a deficiency judgment, unanimously affirmed, with twenty dollars costs and disbursements. No opinion.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Martin, P.J. McAvoy, O'Malley, Glennon and Cohn, JJ.
